# https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/win32/api/verrsrc/ns-verrsrc-vs_fixedfileinfo

  ffi=FixedFileInfo(
    # filevers and prodvers should be tuples of four integers: (Major, Minor, Patch, Build)
    # For V1.0.0
    filevers=(1, 0, 0, 0),
    prodvers=(1, 0, 0, 0),
    # Mask and flags are standard, no need to change
    mask=0x3f,
    flags=0x0,
    # The operating system for which this file was designed.
    OS=0x40004,
    # The general type of file. VFT_APP for an application.
    fileType=0x1,
    subtype=0x0,
    date=(0, 0)
    ),
  kids=[
    StringFileInfo(
      [
      # Language and code page. 040904B0 is for English (US), UTF-8.
      StringTable(
        u'040904B0',
